Class Engine

java.lang.Object
engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Engine extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an engine of a vehicle. This class provides information about the engine type and its horsepower. It implements Serializable to allow engine objects to be serialized.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Engine

      public Engine()
      Default constructor initializing engine with default values. ID is set to 0, engine type to "Unknown", and horsepower to 0.

    • Engine

      public Engine(int id, String engineType, int horsepower)
      Constructor that initializes the engine with specified values.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the engine.
      engineType - The type of the engine.
      horsepower - The horsepower of the engine.

  • Method Details

    • showEngineInfo

      public void showEngineInfo()
      Displays engine information to the console. Currently, it does not implement any output functionality.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the engine.
      Returns:
      the ID of the engine.

    • getInfo

      public String getInfo()
      Returns a formatted string with engine information.
      Returns:
      a string containing the engine's ID, type, and horsepower.

    • getEngineType

      public String getEngineType()
      Returns the type of the engine.
      Returns:
      the engine type.

    • setEngineType

      public void setEngineType(String engineType)
      Sets the type of the engine.
      Parameters:
      engineType - the new type of the engine.

    • getHorsepower

      public int getHorsepower()
      Returns the horsepower of the engine.
      Returns:
      the horsepower of the engine.

    • setHorsepower

      public void setHorsepower(int horsepower)
      Sets the horsepower of the engine.
      Parameters:
      horsepower - the new horsepower of the engine.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the engine.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string with the engine's information.
